Posts.Content: Singasong1 wrote: This is my third breast cancer recurrence, that has now metastasized in the soft tissue in my middle around my esophagus. This makes it difficult to swallow solid food. I had no evidence of recurrence, just an ache in my side for a couple of months that came and went, and then the swallowing issue. I started chemo and 2x daily oral...anyone else experience this rare breast cancer recurrence? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Soft tissue metastis around my middle around esophagus Singasong1 Longtimesurvivor
